title: Veiled Legacy
description: When forbidden magic meets forbidden love, their hearts cast the deadliest spell of all.At Westbrook University, ancient magic runs deep beneath the ivy-covered walls, and Eve has more to hide than most. As the last heir of a powerful magical bloodline, she must conceal her true identity while hunting for an artifact that could change everything about how magic works.Her carefully laid plans never accounted for Nate Ashford, the devastatingly handsome Triad member tasked with exposing her secrets. He's supposed to be her enemy, yet his touch sends her magic into overdrive, making their connection impossible to deny.As their powers inexplicably enhance each other, scorching attraction ignites into an inferno that threatens to expose everything. Every stolen touch brings them closer to discovery â€“ and to the dark forces that would destroy them both to keep magical bloodlines separate forever. In a world of rigid magical control, their forbidden connection could get them both killed."An addictive blend of magic and steamy romance that will leave readers spellbound."Duty bound them to different paths. Desire forged them into one. Their forbidden magic could tear the magical world apart... or finally break the chains that have bound it for centuries.
author: Annie Lavigne
